entry.title: Welcome to My Site
entry.content:
I thought it was time to launch a new site seperate from my developer blog at FreelancePHP so that I could blog about more that just PHP related things. I’ve got lots of opinions and idea’s and I wanted somewhere nice to put them.

This is just an introduction post so I won’t go into too much detail for now but I intend to blog about many things related to Startups, Entrepreneurship, leadership and development processes and best practices.

Keep an eye out for some posts coming your way in a few weeks.

Mark
